itemDescription: British presenter of motoring television programmes

wikipedia_page.main: Mike Brewer (born 28 August 1964) is an English car trader turned presenter of motoring television programmes. He currently presents Wheeler Dealers on the Discovery Channel with Marc (or Elvis) Priestley.

response: Wheeler Dealers is a British TV series originally produced by Attaboy TV for the Discovery Channel in the UK and for Motor Trend in the U.S. The programme is fronted by car enthusiast and former dealer Mike Brewer. Edd China was the show's mechanic for Series 1-13 (2003-2017). Ant Anstead took over from China for Series 14-16 (2017-2021). Former Formula One Mechanic Marc Elvis Priestley took over from Anstead ahead of Series 17 in 2021.

Mike Brewer uses his skills as a former car trader to scout and buy used cars to be restored and sold for profit. He's also responsible for procuring replacement parts and sometimes specialists to refurbish expensive parts.

Discovery U.S.'s Velocity channel commissioned a series of one-hour Wheeler Dealers: Top 5 Specials hosted by Mike Brewer, featuring the top five vehicles of each genre Brewer and China have worked on during the first nine years of the show.

Auto Trader is a British television series, first shown on the Discovery Channel. It was presented by Mike Brewer and Edd China, who have worked together on other television series, including Wheeler Dealers.
Mike Brewer (born 1964) is a British presenter of motoring television programmes.
